Title: Kabir Singh
Writer: Siddharth-Garima (dialogue), Siddharth Singh (dialogue), Sandeep Reddy Vanga, Garima Wahal (dialogue)
Actors: Shahid Kapoor, Kiara Advani, Nikita Dutta, Soham Majumdar
Plot: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.
